thread.title: Somwang Nuelsuma
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Somwang Nuelsuma

author: Somwang Nuelsuma
title: Somwang Nuelsuma
text:
Excellent shipping well we all like that's
But the owner manual are for experience plumber not for home owner do its your self because we don't
Know this system use less pressure from main line need to call for questions and order water reducing valve because this NS3 required income water pressure at 75psi and system stilled in garage waiting for PRD
